channel.title: Same old problem
channel.description: I have portforwarded, set up an no-ip, added exceptions to the firewall etc. Checked on multiple port sites, all say the port is open. My friend tries to connect and he gets a bunch of class errors in the loader. Can someone please help me? Ive had plenty of servers online before but 718s are really giving me a run for my money lol. I can provide tv details
